channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Impassive road, 19th February
item.description:
Large swathes of the road have massive potholes some of the road is literally impassive
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fauconberg Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Craters!, 19th February
item.description:
All grouped together road is diabolical and no where to actually drive because of the amount of potholes damaging cars
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Hearne Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Several potholes all clumped together, 19th February
item.description:
This needs replacing you have to go on the other side of the carriageway to safely pass, quite deep all placed together
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole massive, 19th February
item.description:
Large potholes several down the road that are getting deeper, cars having to swerve onto the other side of the carriageway to avoid
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 112, Charlton Lane, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road eroded causing flooding, excess mud, difficulty for refuge collectors to move bins/boxes., 19th February
item.description:
The drop curb outside 46 Moorend Park Rd. There has been an excess of mud build up over the years. This has caused a dip in the road which is filling up with water. The refuge collectors are having to drag bins and operate around this as this is where the bin collections are left for 46 and 48. There is also a tree there which leaves them no option but to wade through the mud and water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Moorend Park Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Moorend Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree fallen across footpath, 19th February
item.description:
Tree has fallen overnight (18.02.26) blocking footpath along river at Wellinghill Farm (GL52 6UT) We will temporarily divert the footpath around the fallen tree whilst it is dealt with. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nasty pothole, 19th February
item.description:
Just past Tresillion in Brockhampton Lane going towards railway barriers on the left side, quite a severe pothole. The worst of many in that area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Bishop's Cleeve
